name: Dragon Legacy: Rebirth
description:
-3D vertical action RPG
-Easy to use with zero threshold
-Nearly a thousand unique cool skills and ten thousand kinds of equipment, and more than 100 heroes are waiting for you to collect!
-Whether you are at work or resting, you can continue to improve your combat power
-Unprecedented RPG experience of bloody battle
Fight to become the strongest warrior in the universe!

-Placing RPG
Simple and fast combat system
Highly intelligent AI system helps you get into battle with one click and strengthen the lineup
More time-saving and labor-saving offline mode
It's a brand-new experience of idle click battle game!

-Gem bloodline and skill technology coordination
Watch the heroes in this hot-blooded competitive RPG show their talents!
Multi-dimensionality can enhance the character's combat power attributes
Step forward to the strongest hero!

-Exquisite modeling, unique vertical painting
We have customized 3D shapes for many familiar heroes!
And design unique stand-up pictures for all heroes!

-Forging system
Collect dungeon reward equipment and obtain various fantasy materials
Fantastic legendary equipment is hidden in the game

Online PVP battle
Who is the real king in the arena?
Challenge higher rankings and climb to the top of the leaderboard
As long as you participate in the qualifying competition, you can get various rewards and honors!
There are also customized badges that are only available in the entire server, waiting for you!
